description: Returns metadata related to the given identity, including when the identity was created and any associated linked logins. You must use Amazon Web Services developer credentials to call this operation.

parameters.name: IdentityId
parameters.description: A unique identifier in the format REGION:GUID.

nested_items.name: IdentityId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier in the format REGION:GUID.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: Date on which the identity was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: Date on which the identity was last modified.
